article.title: BAE to Provide Autonomous Surveillance-Imaging System
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Autonomous Real-Time Ground Ubiqitous Surveillance-Imaging System

article.text: BAE Systems, Nashua, New Hampshire, is being awarded a $9 million firm-fixed-price contract for one Autonomous Real-Time Ground Ubiquitous Surveillance-Imaging System with options for two additional systems.Â The Air Force Materiel Command, Aeronautical Systems Center, 645th Aeronautical Systems Group, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
